original: 北海營陵縣人，曹魏官員，王修之子。為人耿直，司馬師、司馬昭主持的東關之戰大敗，王儀因直陳敗戰之過在於司馬昭，惹怒司馬昭，遭到殺害。
text: A native of Yingling County, Beihai, an official of Cao Wei, son of Wang Xiu. Upright, Sima Shi and Sima Zhao were presided over by Sima Zhao and were defeated in the battle of Dongguan. Wang Yi was killed by angering Sima Zhao because he claimed that the defeat was in Sima Zhao.
